features: 3-Way Auto Shutoff- Get peace of mind with motion-sensitive technology that automatically shuts off the iron if left inactive on its heel, side or soleplate.Wipe soleplate and outer surfaces with a soft cloth dampened with water
Anti-Drip- Engineered to prevent dripping by maintaining water at the proper temperature needed to generate steam. Volts : 120V. Wattage : 1200W. Requires AC Power. Easy-Fill Translucent Water Tank
TrueGlide Nonstick Soleplate-The enhanced soleplate is designed to glide smoothly across all fabric types for ease of use
Spray Mist- This push-button mister helps moisten fabrics to tackle and smooth away deep wrinkles
Comfort Grip - Handle Ergonomically shaped to fit hand contours for comfort.
body.description: Compact yet powerful, this easy-to-use nonstick iron features proprietary SmartSteam™ technology, automatically regulating steam level based on fabric setting to streamline controls and take the guesswork out of ironing. The 3-way auto shutoff provides added peace of mind.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: BLACK+DECKER Easy Steam Compact Iron, IR40V Compact yet powerful, this easy-to-use nonstick iron features proprietary SmartSteam technology, automatically regulating steam level based on fabric setting to streamline controls and take the guesswork out of ironing. The 3-way auto shutoff provides added peace of mind.

Key Features SmartSteam Technology This proprietary technology automatically regulates the amount of steam based on the temperature setting to streamline controls for optimal results. 3-Way Auto Shutoff Get peace of mind with motion-sensitive technology that automatically shuts off the iron if left inactive on its heel, side or soleplate. TrueGlide Nonstick Soleplate The enhanced soleplate is designed to glide smoothly across all fabric types for ease of use. Anti-Drip Engineered to prevent dripping by maintaining water at the proper temperature needed to generate steam.

Spray Mist This push-button mister helps moisten fabrics to tackle and smooth away deep wrinkles. Comfort Grip Handle Ergonomically shaped to fit hand contours for comfort. 360⁰ Pivoting Cord Handy feature freely moves cord out of the way while ironing. Fabric Guide Temperature settings are conveniently located on the top of the translucent water tank for quick and easy reference. Spray Mist Comfort Grip Handle 360⁰ Pivoting Cord Fabric Guide

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works like a top notch IRON
reviews.reviewText: Easy to use, light but very effective in ironing, shirts, pants, etc. I have used it as a steamer when putting up new curtains - that was a blessing, the steam was thick and wrinkles came right out. A very good purchase!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Steaming very well
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. It's very handy and compact.It's light and heat up very quickly.Great price as quality . Reasonable price.But sometimes water leaks . Manage your self.Anyway I like it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good For Money
reviews.reviewText: Rating: ★★★★☆ (4/5)Following additional usage and consideration, I'm providing an updated review for the textile iron, taking into account various factors, including its affordability, basic features, and the notable limitation of its steam function. Here's a balanced assessment:Limited Steam Functionality: ★★☆☆☆ (2/5)The textile iron's most significant drawback remains its limited steam output, which affects its ability to handle stubborn wrinkles and heavier fabrics effectively. While it struggles with these tasks, it's still serviceable for lighter ironing needs.Basic Features and Affordability: ★★★★☆ (4/5)The iron retains its affordability, adjustable temperature settings, lightweight design, and fundamental features. For straightforward ironing tasks and those on a budget, it continues to offer reasonable value.Value Considerations: ★★★★☆ (4/5)Considering its lower price point and basic functionality, the textile iron can still be seen as a valuable option, especially for individuals seeking a budget-friendly choice. However, its steam limitations mean that it may not fully meet the needs of those with more demanding ironing requirements.In summary, the textile iron offers affordability and basic features, but its limited steam functionality remains a notable drawback. While it may not excel in handling tougher ironing tasks, it can still serve adequately for lighter needs. If you prioritize budget-friendliness and don't rely heavily on steam, this iron may suit your requirements. However, if your ironing demands include dealing with stubborn wrinkles or heavier fabrics, it's advisable to explore options with stronger steam capabilities. The overall rating reflects a balanced assessment that acknowledges both its affordability and its limitations.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Worth the money
reviews.reviewText: Light weight and does the job. There isn’t a cover where the water goes, but if you don’t overload it with water it’s fine. It steams well and does the job. Worth the price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Good value, quality. Worth the price. Works very well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 29, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Very light in weight and works perfectly

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Didn't last long
reviews.reviewText: This iron worked well, but for only 6 months. I iron about 6-7 pants once a week and after 6 months it just stopped working.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 6, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: Great product, easy to use! I just wish there was a clip on the plug to hold it together when you wrap the cord, like there are on similar products.
Es mi primer plancha de esta marca y hasta ahora no he tenido problema ni con el vapor ni el deslizamiento.
Me encantó, funciona muy bien, es liviana y cumple mis expectativas ☺️
Muy buena elección para el precio
Funciona bien, sin problema. Básica, para uso rápido.
